In B2B sales, timing is everythingThe best conversations start when your prospect is already in motion. Thatâ€™s where Sales Triggers come in.If youâ€™re in IT Services, Product Engineering, or IT Staffing, you canâ€™t afford to wait for RFPs to land in your inbox.You need to act before vendor evaluations begin.Thatâ€™s how smart teams earn the right conversation at the right moment.After years of working with IT services and staffing teams, here are the Sales Triggers top-performing teams track:ğŸ”µ Primary Triggers- Leadership changes- New funding or M&A- RFPs / RFIs- GenAI adoption or tech modernization- Job postings for niche roles- Layoffs + active projectsğŸŸ  Secondary Triggers- Tech stack migration- Budget season- Regulatory or compliance pressure- Product launch or market expansionHere's a visual snapshot we often use internally to guide outreach:ğŸ’¡ A Trigger â‰  A Closed DealJust because you spotted a trigger and sent a messageâ€¦ Doesnâ€™t mean youâ€™ll win the deal. You still need:- A compelling value proposition- Right ICP match- Context on their goals- Trusted follow-upItâ€™s like seeing someone pack for vacation â€” you still donâ€™t know where theyâ€™re going or if they need your help.Instead of saying â€œCan we connect?â€, say:â€œI noticed your product team is hiring in DevOps and just announced a GenAI initiative. Would it help to explore a lean offshore pod to scale faster? Weâ€™ve done this for similar teams â€” happy to share how.â€ğŸ¯ Trigger-based selling isnâ€™t just smart â€” itâ€™s respectful. Youâ€™re showing up with relevance, not noise.Letâ€™s Talk: Are you using any unusual or effective trigger points with your team? Drop them in the comments â€” letâ€™s swap ideas.ğŸ› ï¸ Running trigger-based outreach but not seeing results? Letâ€™s review whatâ€™s missing in your Trigger â†’ Outreach â†’ Conversion playbook.ğŸ“© Drop a ğŸ”¥ or DM me for a quick 1:1 teardown.hashtag#B2BSales hashtag#ITStaffing hashtag#ProductEngineering hashtag#SalesTriggers hashtag#SmartOutreach hashtag#GTMStrategy hashtag#SalesPlaybook hashtag#ABM hashtag#LeadGen hashtag#SalesExecution

Would it help to explore a lean offshore pod to scale faster? Weâ€™ve done this for similar teams â€” happy to share how.â€ğŸ¯ Trigger-based selling isnâ€™t just smart â€” itâ€™s respectful. In B2B sales, timing is everythingThe best conversations start when your prospect is already in motion. You still need:- A compelling value proposition- Right ICP match- Context on their goals- Trusted follow-upItâ€™s like seeing someone pack for vacation â€” you still donâ€™t know where theyâ€™re going or if they need your help.Instead of saying â€œCan we connect?â€, say:â€œI noticed your product team is hiring in DevOps and just announced a GenAI initiative. Would it help to explore a lean offshore pod to scale faster? Weâ€™ve done this for similar teams â€” happy to share how.â€ğŸ¯ Trigger-based selling isnâ€™t just smart â€” itâ€™s respectful. Youâ€™re showing up with relevance, not noise.Letâ€™s Talk: Are you using any unusual or effective trigger points with your team? Drop them in the comments â€” letâ€™s swap ideas.ğŸ› ï¸ Running trigger-based outreach but not seeing results? Would it help to explore a lean offshore pod to scale faster? Weâ€™ve done this for similar teams â€” happy to share how.â€ğŸ¯ Trigger-based selling isnâ€™t just smart â€” itâ€™s respectful. Would it help to explore a lean offshore pod to scale faster? Weâ€™ve done this for similar teams â€” happy to share how.â€ğŸ¯ Trigger-based selling isnâ€™t just smart â€” itâ€™s respectful. Youâ€™re showing up with relevance, not noise.Letâ€™s Talk: Are you using any unusual or effective trigger points with your team? Drop them in the comments â€” letâ€™s swap ideas.ğŸ› ï¸ Running trigger-based outreach but not seeing results? In B2B sales, timing is everythingThe best conversations start when your prospect is already in motion. Thatâ€™s where Sales Triggers come in.If youâ€™re in IT Services, Product Engineering, or IT Staffing, you canâ€™t afford to wait for RFPs to land in your inbox.You need to act before vendor evaluations begin.Thatâ€™s how smart teams earn the right conversation at the right moment.After years of working with IT services and staffing teams, here are the Sales Triggers top-performing teams track:ğŸ”µ Primary Triggers- Leadership changes- New funding or M&A- RFPs / RFIs- GenAI adoption or tech modernization- Job postings for niche roles- Layoffs + active projectsğŸŸ  Secondary Triggers- Tech stack migration- Budget season- Regulatory or compliance pressure- Product launch or market expansionHere's a visual snapshot we often use internally to guide outreach:ğŸ’¡ A Trigger â‰  A Closed DealJust because you spotted a trigger and sent a messageâ€¦ Doesnâ€™t mean youâ€™ll win the deal. Would it help to explore a lean offshore pod to scale faster? Weâ€™ve done this for similar teams â€” happy to share how.â€ğŸ¯ Trigger-based selling isnâ€™t just smart â€” itâ€™s respectful. You still need:- A compelling value proposition- Right ICP match- Context on their goals- Trusted follow-upItâ€™s like seeing someone pack for vacation â€” you still donâ€™t know where theyâ€™re going or if they need your help.Instead of saying â€œCan we connect?â€, say:â€œI noticed your product team is hiring in DevOps and just announced a GenAI initiative. Would it help to explore a lean offshore pod to scale faster? Weâ€™ve done this for similar teams â€” happy to share how.â€ğŸ¯ Trigger-based selling isnâ€™t just smart â€” itâ€™s respectful. Youâ€™re showing up with relevance, not noise.Letâ€™s Talk: Are you using any unusual or effective trigger points with your team? Drop them in the comments â€” letâ€™s swap ideas.ğŸ› ï¸ Running trigger-based outreach but not seeing results? You still need:- A compelling value proposition- Right ICP match- Context on their goals- Trusted follow-upItâ€™s like seeing someone pack for vacation â€” you still donâ€™t know where theyâ€™re going or if they need your help.Instead of saying â€œCan we connect?â€, say:â€œI noticed your product team is hiring in DevOps and just announced a GenAI initiative. Would it help to explore a lean offshore pod to scale faster? Weâ€™ve done this for similar teams â€” happy to share how.â€ğŸ¯ Trigger-based selling isnâ€™t just smart â€” itâ€™s respectful. Drop them in the comments â€” letâ€™s swap ideas.ğŸ› ï¸ Running trigger-based outreach but not seeing results? In B2B sales, timing is everythingThe best conversations start when your prospect is already in motion. Thatâ€™s where Sales Triggers come in.If youâ€™re in IT Services, Product Engineering, or IT Staffing, you canâ€™t afford to wait for RFPs to land in your inbox.You need to act before vendor evaluations begin.Thatâ€™s how smart teams earn the right conversation at the right moment.After years of working with IT services and staffing teams, here are the Sales Triggers top-performing teams track:ğŸ”µ Primary Triggers- Leadership changes- New funding or M&A- RFPs / RFIs- GenAI adoption or tech modernization- Job postings for niche roles- Layoffs + active projectsğŸŸ  Secondary Triggers- Tech stack migration- Budget season- Regulatory or compliance pressure- Product launch or market expansionHere's a visual snapshot we often use internally to guide outreach:ğŸ’¡ A Trigger â‰  A Closed DealJust because you spotted a trigger and sent a messageâ€¦ Doesnâ€™t mean youâ€™ll win the deal. You still need:- A compelling value proposition- Right ICP match- Context on their goals- Trusted follow-upItâ€™s like seeing someone pack for vacation â€” you still donâ€™t know where theyâ€™re going or if they need your help.Instead of saying â€œCan we connect?â€, say:â€œI noticed your product team is hiring in DevOps and just announced a GenAI initiative. Would it help to explore a lean offshore pod to scale faster? Weâ€™ve done this for similar teams â€” happy to share how.â€ğŸ¯ Trigger-based selling isnâ€™t just smart â€” itâ€™s respectful. Youâ€™re showing up with relevance, not noise.Letâ€™s Talk: Are you using any unusual or effective trigger points with your team? Drop them in the comments â€” letâ€™s swap ideas.ğŸ› ï¸ Running trigger-based outreach but not seeing results? Letâ€™s review whatâ€™s missing in your Trigger â†’ Outreach â†’ Conversion playbook.ğŸ“© Drop a ğŸ”¥ or DM me for a quick 1:1 teardown.hashtag#B2BSales hashtag#ITStaffing hashtag#ProductEngineering hashtag#SalesTriggers hashtag#SmartOutreach hashtag#GTMStrategy hashtag#SalesPlaybook hashtag#ABM hashtag#LeadGen hashtag#SalesExecution

In B2B sales, timing is everythingThe best conversations start when your prospect is already in motion. Thatâ€™s where Sales Triggers come in.If youâ€™re in IT Services, Product Engineering, or IT Staffing, you canâ€™t afford to wait for RFPs to land in your inbox.You need to act before vendor evaluations begin.Thatâ€™s how smart teams earn the right conversation at the right moment.After years of working with IT services and staffing teams, here are the Sales Triggers top-performing teams track:ğŸ”µ Primary Triggers- Leadership changes- New funding or M&A- RFPs / RFIs- GenAI adoption or tech modernization- Job postings for niche roles- Layoffs + active projectsğŸŸ  Secondary Triggers- Tech stack migration- Budget season- Regulatory or compliance pressure- Product launch or market expansionHere's a visual snapshot we often use internally to guide outreach:ğŸ’¡ A Trigger â‰  A Closed DealJust because you spotted a trigger and sent a messageâ€¦ Doesnâ€™t mean youâ€™ll win the deal. You still need:- A compelling value proposition- Right ICP match- Context on their goals- Trusted follow-upItâ€™s like seeing someone pack for vacation â€” you still donâ€™t know where theyâ€™re going or if they need your help.Instead of saying â€œCan we connect?â€, say:â€œI noticed your product team is hiring in DevOps and just announced a GenAI initiative. Would it help to explore a lean offshore pod to scale faster? Weâ€™ve done this for similar teams â€” happy to share how.â€ğŸ¯ Trigger-based selling isnâ€™t just smart â€” itâ€™s respectful. Youâ€™re showing up with relevance, not noise.Letâ€™s Talk: Are you using any unusual or effective trigger points with your team? Drop them in the comments â€” letâ€™s swap ideas.ğŸ› ï¸ Running trigger-based outreach but not seeing results? Letâ€™s review whatâ€™s missing in your Trigger â†’ Outreach â†’ Conversion playbook.ğŸ“© Drop a ğŸ”¥ or DM me for a quick 1:1 teardown.hashtag#B2BSales hashtag#ITStaffing hashtag#ProductEngineering hashtag#SalesTriggers hashtag#SmartOutreach hashtag#GTMStrategy hashtag#SalesPlaybook hashtag#ABM hashtag#LeadGen hashtag#SalesExecution

In B2B sales, timing is everythingThe best conversations start when your prospect is already in motion. Thatâ€™s where Sales Triggers come in.If youâ€™re in IT Services, Product Engineering, or IT Staffing, you canâ€™t afford to wait for RFPs to land in your inbox.You need to act before vendor evaluations begin.Thatâ€™s how smart teams earn the right conversation at the right moment.After years of working with IT services and staffing teams, here are the Sales Triggers top-performing teams track:ğŸ”µ Primary Triggers- Leadership changes- New funding or M&A- RFPs / RFIs- GenAI adoption or tech modernization- Job postings for niche roles- Layoffs + active projectsğŸŸ  Secondary Triggers- Tech stack migration- Budget season- Regulatory or compliance pressure- Product launch or market expansionHere's a visual snapshot we often use internally to guide outreach:ğŸ’¡ A Trigger â‰  A Closed DealJust because you spotted a trigger and sent a messageâ€¦ Doesnâ€™t mean youâ€™ll win the deal. You still need:- A compelling value proposition- Right ICP match- Context on their goals- Trusted follow-upItâ€™s like seeing someone pack for vacation â€” you still donâ€™t know where theyâ€™re going or if they need your help.Instead of saying â€œCan we connect?â€, say:â€œI noticed your product team is hiring in DevOps and just announced a GenAI initiative. In B2B sales, timing is everythingThe best conversations start when your prospect is already in motion. Thatâ€™s where Sales Triggers come in.If youâ€™re in IT Services, Product Engineering, or IT Staffing, you canâ€™t afford to wait for RFPs to land in your inbox.You need to act before vendor evaluations begin.Thatâ€™s how smart teams earn the right conversation at the right moment.After years of working with IT services and staffing teams, here are the Sales Triggers top-performing teams track:ğŸ”µ Primary Triggers- Leadership changes- New funding or M&A- RFPs / RFIs- GenAI adoption or tech modernization- Job postings for niche roles- Layoffs + active projectsğŸŸ  Secondary Triggers- Tech stack migration- Budget season- Regulatory or compliance pressure- Product launch or market expansionHere's a visual snapshot we often use internally to guide outreach:ğŸ’¡ A Trigger â‰  A Closed DealJust because you spotted a trigger and sent a messageâ€¦ Doesnâ€™t mean youâ€™ll win the deal. You still need:- A compelling value proposition- Right ICP match- Context on their goals- Trusted follow-upItâ€™s like seeing someone pack for vacation â€” you still donâ€™t know where theyâ€™re going or if they need your help.Instead of saying â€œCan we connect?â€, say:â€œI noticed your product team is hiring in DevOps and just announced a GenAI initiative. Would it help to explore a lean offshore pod to scale faster? Weâ€™ve done this for similar teams â€” happy to share how.â€ğŸ¯ Trigger-based selling isnâ€™t just smart â€” itâ€™s respectful. Youâ€™re showing up with relevance, not noise.Letâ€™s Talk: Are you using any unusual or effective trigger points with your team? Drop them in the comments â€” letâ€™s swap ideas.ğŸ› ï¸ Running trigger-based outreach but not seeing results? Letâ€™s review whatâ€™s missing in your Trigger â†’ Outreach â†’ Conversion playbook.ğŸ“© Drop a ğŸ”¥ or DM me for a quick 1:1 teardown.hashtag#B2BSales hashtag#ITStaffing hashtag#ProductEngineering hashtag#SalesTriggers hashtag#SmartOutreach hashtag#GTMStrategy hashtag#SalesPlaybook hashtag#ABM hashtag#LeadGen hashtag#SalesExecution

Would it help to explore a lean offshore pod to scale faster? Weâ€™ve done this for similar teams â€” happy to share how.â€ğŸ¯ Trigger-based selling isnâ€™t just smart â€” itâ€™s respectful. Drop them in the comments â€” letâ€™s swap ideas.ğŸ› ï¸ Running trigger-based outreach but not seeing results? Would it help to explore a lean offshore pod to scale faster? Weâ€™ve done this for similar teams â€” happy to share how.â€ğŸ¯ Trigger-based selling isnâ€™t just smart â€” itâ€™s respectful. Youâ€™re showing up with relevance, not noise.Letâ€™s Talk: Are you using any unusual or effective trigger points with your team? Drop them in the comments â€” letâ€™s swap ideas.ğŸ› ï¸ Running trigger-based outreach but not seeing results? In B2B sales, timing is everythingThe best conversations start when your prospect is already in motion. Thatâ€™s where Sales Triggers come in.If youâ€™re in IT Services, Product Engineering, or IT Staffing, you canâ€™t afford to wait for RFPs to land in your inbox.You need to act before vendor evaluations begin.Thatâ€™s how smart teams earn the right conversation at the right moment.After years of working with IT services and staffing teams, here are the Sales Triggers top-performing teams track:ğŸ”µ Primary Triggers- Leadership changes- New funding or M&A- RFPs / RFIs- GenAI adoption or tech modernization- Job postings for niche roles- Layoffs + active projectsğŸŸ  Secondary Triggers- Tech stack migration- Budget season- Regulatory or compliance pressure- Product launch or market expansionHere's a visual snapshot we often use internally to guide outreach:ğŸ’¡ A Trigger â‰  A Closed DealJust because you spotted a trigger and sent a messageâ€¦ Doesnâ€™t mean youâ€™ll win the deal. You still need:- A compelling value proposition- Right ICP match- Context on their goals- Trusted follow-upItâ€™s like seeing someone pack for vacation â€” you still donâ€™t know where theyâ€™re going or if they need your help.Instead of saying â€œCan we connect?â€, say:â€œI noticed your product team is hiring in DevOps and just announced a GenAI initiative. Would it help to explore a lean offshore pod to scale faster? Weâ€™ve done this for similar teams â€” happy to share how.â€ğŸ¯ Trigger-based selling isnâ€™t just smart â€” itâ€™s respectful. Youâ€™re showing up with relevance, not noise.Letâ€™s Talk: Are you using any unusual or effective trigger points with your team? Drop them in the comments â€” letâ€™s swap ideas.ğŸ› ï¸ Running trigger-based outreach but not seeing results? In B2B sales, timing is everythingThe best conversations start when your prospect is already in motion. Thatâ€™s where Sales Triggers come in.If youâ€™re in IT Services, Product Engineering, or IT Staffing, you canâ€™t afford to wait for RFPs to land in your inbox.You need to act before vendor evaluations begin.Thatâ€™s how smart teams earn the right conversation at the right moment.After years of working with IT services and staffing teams, here are the Sales Triggers top-performing teams track:ğŸ”µ Primary Triggers- Leadership changes- New funding or M&A- RFPs / RFIs- GenAI adoption or tech modernization- Job postings for niche roles- Layoffs + active projectsğŸŸ  Secondary Triggers- Tech stack migration- Budget season- Regulatory or compliance pressure- Product launch or market expansionHere's a visual snapshot we often use internally to guide outreach:ğŸ’¡ A Trigger â‰  A Closed DealJust because you spotted a trigger and sent a messageâ€¦ Doesnâ€™t mean youâ€™ll win the deal. You still need:- A compelling value proposition- Right ICP match- Context on their goals- Trusted follow-upItâ€™s like seeing someone pack for vacation â€” you still donâ€™t know where theyâ€™re going or if they need your help.Instead of saying â€œCan we connect?â€, say:â€œI noticed your product team is hiring in DevOps and just announced a GenAI initiative. Would it help to explore a lean offshore pod to scale faster? Weâ€™ve done this for similar teams â€” happy to share how.â€ğŸ¯ Trigger-based selling isnâ€™t just smart â€” itâ€™s respectful. Youâ€™re showing up with relevance, not noise.Letâ€™s Talk: Are you using any unusual or effective trigger points with your team? Drop them in the comments â€” letâ€™s swap ideas.ğŸ› ï¸ Running trigger-based outreach but not seeing results? Letâ€™s review whatâ€™s missing in your Trigger â†’ Outreach â†’ Conversion playbook.ğŸ“© Drop a ğŸ”¥ or DM me for a quick 1:1 teardown.hashtag#B2BSales hashtag#ITStaffing hashtag#ProductEngineering hashtag#SalesTriggers hashtag#SmartOutreach hashtag#GTMStrategy hashtag#SalesPlaybook hashtag#ABM hashtag#LeadGen hashtag#SalesExecution
